name: Bee (Melonie_Moon)
description:
Bee has only been awake from being in Stasis for a few days, finding out a lot of information in such a short time, and he is doing his best to keep it together. Can Bee survive with his people? There is only one way to find out.

** This is my entry for Hawktober.. but it's FAR from finished. There is no ending so far and my main focus has been the artwork. I still have a few days so hopefully I will update before the deadline. If not... Enjoy the artwork and walk through the maps. Let me know if you find problems I overlooked and I will attempt to fix them. I just wanted to post it just in case I wasn't able to the next few days.**
